title: all the vicious rows between the wives and girlfriends of footballers
text:

Rebekah Vardy has become embroiled in a war of the WAGs as Coleen Rooney has claimed her former friend has been acting as a secret mole by selling details about her personal life to the press for years.

As the duo squabble in an extraordinary Twitter rant, we take a look at all the previous WAGS at war...

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

Rebekah Vardy

In 2016, Rebekah Vardy lashed out at one of the world's most famous , Victoria Beckham, for using her children to promote 'Brand Beckham'.

The mum-of-three slammed Posh Spice for helping her son Cruz to release a Christmas charity single at the time.

Victoria had been distancing herself from the circle of footballers' wives with Rebekah, Coleen Rooney and Abbey Crouch. But previously she was regularly seen in the stands with Cheryl and Alex Gerrard.

(Image: PA)

Victoria Beckham

Seven years into her marriage with the England captain David Beckham , Victoria was the Queen of the WAGs.

In 2010, Victoria made headlines when it was claimed she refused to stay in the same hotel as the rest of the England team's wives and girlfriends during the World Cup in Cape Town.

A source told Mail Online at the time: "There was no way she was going to be staying anywhere near the WAGs this World Cup.

"Victoria was concerned by Ashley Cole and John Terry's behaviour and does not want to be associated with anything like that at all."

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images)

(Image: Daily Mirror)

Katie Price

The former glamour model had an infamous fall out with Victoria Beckham back in 2000 when Katie got jealous over Victoria's collaboration with her then-boyfriend, Dane Bowers.

Katie Price and Victoria Beckham's spat was the stuff of noughties nastiness, with the two women slinging mud throughout the decade.

It got even more bitter when Katie claimed VB and her mate sang Who Let The Dogs Out at her in Manchester United's players' lounge.

(Image: Tim P. Whitby/Getty Images)

Posh Spice then upped the ante by branding Katie 'vile' on national TV.

Katie and Victoria initially started out as friends, touring the country with David and Dane to promote Victoria's 2000 single, Out Of My Mind.

But Katie blamed hanging out with the Beckhams for her subsequent split from Dane, claiming it "changed" him.

Nicola McClean

In 2017, former WAG Nicola McClean blasted Danielle Lloyd over a squabble about who was invited to her and Jamie O'Hara's wedding in 2012.

Danielle took to Twitter to point out that Nicola wasn't there, and if she had turned up in the evening she had been crashing the party.

(Image: Lia Toby/WENN.com)

Nicola hit back saying: "You're Danielle Lloyd not f**king Beyonce !"

Danielle then had another dig at the glamour model in regard to her former friend's previous comments that she was a 'wannabe WAG.'
description: As Coleen Rooney accuses Rebekah Vardy of selling stories on her private life, we take a look at all the vicious wars between WAGS over the years
